metadata.title: CVE-2017-12457 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The bfd_make_section_with_flags function in section.c in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause a NULL dereference via acrafted file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
